mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.sub_title, p.pic, p.price, p.promotion_price, p.description, p.album_pics, p.detail_html, p.param_html, pss.id sku_id, pss.sku_code sku_sku_code, pss.pic sku_pic, pss.price sku_price, pss.stock sku_stock, pss.sp1 sku_sp1, pss.sp2 sku_sp2, pss.sp3 sku_sp3, pss.sale sku_sp3 FROM pms_sku_stock pss LEFT JOIN pms_product p ON pss.product_id=p.id WHERE p.id=#{id}
